column2: "Afei dɛm bosoom yi  ne da a otsia eduonu anan no mu no Israelmba no dze mbuadadzi
column3: na eyitam
column6: "#9.1 BOSOOM YI: Iyi botum egyina hɔ ama bosoom a ɔtɔ do esuon no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no tseew hɔnho fii ahɔho nyinara ho
column3: na wogyinagyinaa hɔ kekaa hɔn bɔn

column2: "Na wɔsoɛree gyinagyinaa hɔn gyinabew
column3: na wɔkenkaan EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn mbra nwoma no mu
column4: wɔ adzekyee mu nkyɛmu anan mu kor mu; na nkyɛmu anan mu kor so mu wɔdze kaa hɔn bɔn
column5: na wɔdze sɔɔr EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Nna Jesua
column3: na Bani
column10: soɛree gyinagyinaa Levifo sumpii no do
column11: na wɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Nna Levifo no
column3: Jesua
column12: Hom nsoɛr nhyira EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mfi daapem nkesi daapem: na wonhyira w'enyimnyam dzin a wɔama do atra nhyira na ayɛyi nyinara no."

column2: "Ɔwo nye EWURADZE
column3: mekyerɛ wo nkotoo korɛ; ɔwo na eyɛɛ sor
column6: asaase na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ do nyinara
column7: po na dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara
column8: na ɔwoara na ekora hɔn nyinara do; na sor dɔm no

column2: "Ɔwo nye EWURADZE Nyankopɔn no a esaan mu faa Abram
column3: na edze no fiir edzi fii Kaldeafo Ur bae

column2: "ihun n'akoma mu dɛ odzi nokwar wɔ w'enyim
column3: na enye no dzii ahyɛmu dɛ edze Keenanfo
column10: na ama wo nsɛm no etsim; osiandɛ ɔwo yɛ ɔtseneneenyi."

column2: "Na ɔwo hun hɛn egyanom ahohiahia wɔ Egypt
column3: na etsee hɔn nkekamu wɔ Mbɛw Po no ho;"

column2: "na ekyerɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze wɔ Farao
column3: na no nkowaa nyinara
column4: na n'asaase do ɔman no nyinara do; na ɔwoara hun dɛ woedzi hɔn do nkontompɔsɛm; na edze gyee dzin
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔwo epaa po no mu wɔ hɔn enyim
column3: na wɔfaa po no ne finimfin wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ do; na hɔn a wotsiiw hɔn no
column4: etoow hɔn guu ebun no mu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wɔtow ɔbo kyen nsu a ɔyɛ dzen mu."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔwo igyaa hɔn wɔ mununkum dum mu ewiaber; na gya dum mu anadwe
column3: dɛ ɔmma hɔn kan wɔ kwan a ɔwɔ dɛ wodua do no mu."

column2: "Eso ɔwo isianee baa bepɔw Sinai do
column3: na ifii sor nye hɔn kasae
column4: na emaa hɔn atsɛmbu tsenenee na nokwar mbra

column2: "na emaa wohun w'ahomgyeda krɔnkrɔn no
column3: na enam w'akowaa Moses ne nsa do hyɛɛ hɔn mbransɛm

column2: "na emaa hɔn sor edziban dze kum hɔn kɔm
column3: na edze nsu fi botan mu puei maa hɔn dze kum hɔn nsukɔm
column4: na ehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɛfa asaase a emaa wo nsa do dɛ edze bɛma hɔn no."

column2: "Naaso hɔn na hɛn egyanom dzii nkontompɔsɛm
column3: na wɔseen hɔn kɔn
column7: nkyii so wɔannkaa w'anwanwadze a eyɛɛ no wɔ hɔn mu no; mbom wɔseen hɔn kɔn
column8: na hɔn etuatsew no mu wɔhyɛɛ hɔn do safohen dɛ wɔresan akɔ hɔn nkowaasom no mu: na ɔwo yɛ fakyɛfakyɛ Nyankopɔn
column11: na w'adɔyɛ so ntsi ammpow hɔn."

column2: "Nyew
column3: aber a wɔyɛɛ nantwiba a woegu maa hɔnho
column5: Iyi nye wo Nyankopɔn a ɔdze wo fi Egypt bae

column2: "ɔwo wo mbɔbɔrhu pii no ntsi ammpow hɔn wɔ sar no do: mununkum dum no emmfi hɔn do ewiaber
column3: dɛ obegya hɔn wɔ kwan no mu; nkyii so gya dum no anadwe
column4: dɛ ɔbɛma hɔn kan wɔ kwan a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔfa do mu."

column2: "Ɔwo
column3: edze wo sunsum pa no so maa hɔn dɛ ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn
column4: na wo  manna   so amma ammpa hɔn ano
column5: na emaa hɔn nsu dze kum hɔn nsukɔm."

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔwo ehwɛɛ hɔn mfe eduanan wɔ sar no do
column4: na woennhia hwee; hɔn ntar ennsusuw

column2: "Nkyii so ɔwo maa hɔn nhenman na aman a ɔwoara ekyɛe no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn kyɛpɛn tse: nna wɔfaa Sihon asaase
column3: mekyerɛ Hesbonhen asaase

column2: "Hɔn mba so
column3: ɔwo maa wɔdɔɔr dɛ sor nworaba
column4: na edze hɔn baa asaase a ɔwoara esee hɔn egyanom dɛ wɔbɔkɔ do akɛfa no do."

column2: "Nna mba no kɔree na wɔkɛfaa asaase no
column3: na ɔwo ebrɛɛ hɔn a wɔtse asaase no do no
column6: na edze hɔn hyɛɛ hɔn nsa
column8: na asaase no do aman no
column9: ma wɔaayɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔpɛ."

column2: "Na wɔgyegyee nkurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban
column3: na asaase a ɔadɔ seradze
column4: na wonyaa efi a ndzɛmba pa nyinara ahyehyɛ mu amaama
column8: na ndua a wodzi no nsowee
column12: na wɔgyee hɔn enyi wɔ wo papayɛ kɛse no mu."

column2: "Naaso wɔyɛɛ asoɔdzen
column3: na wɔtseew etua wɔ wo do
column4: na wɔtoow wo mbra kyeen hɔn ekyir
column5: na wokunkum wo nkɔnhyɛfo a wodzii dase tsiaa hɔn dɛ wɔdze resan hɔn aba wo nkyɛn no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔwo edze hɔn hyɛɛ hɔn atamfo nsa
column3: hɔn na wohiahiaa hɔn ho: na hɔn ahokyer ber mu no a wosui frɛɛ wo no
column4: ɔwo ifi sor tsiee hɔn; na dɛ mbrɛ w'adɔyɛ pii tse no
column5: ɔwo maa hɔn agyefo a wɔgyee hɔn fii hɔn atamfo nsamu."

column2: "Naaso wonyaa asomdwee ara pɛr na wɔyɛɛ w'enyim bɔn bio: dɛm ntsi ɔwo igyaa hɔn hyɛɛ hɔn atamfo nsa
column3: na wonyaa hɔn do tum: naaso aber a wɔsanee
column5: nna ɔwo fi sor tsiei; na mber pii na ɔwo gyee hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wo mbɔbɔrhu no tse;"

column2: "na ebɔɔ hɔn kɔkɔ dɛ edze hɔn bɛba wo mbra no mu bio: naaso wodzii nkontompɔsɛm
column3: na woenntsie wo mbrasɛm
column4: na wɔyɛɛ bɔn tsiaa w'ahyɛdze a sɛ nyimpa dzi do a obenya mu nkwa no

column2: "Naaso mber pii na ɔwo ekoraa hɔn
column3: na edze wo sunsum nam wo nkɔnhyɛfo do bɔɔ hɔn kɔkɔ: naaso wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie: dɛm ntsi ɔwo iyii hɔn hyɛɛ asaase no do aman no nsa."

column2: "Naaso wo mbɔbɔrhu pii no ntsi
column3: ɔwo ennkum hɔn ase
column4: na ammpow hɔn so; osiandɛ ɔwo yɛ ɔdomfo na mbɔbɔrhufo Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: hɛn Nyankopɔn
column5: ɔkatakyi a wo ho yɛ hu na isie ahyɛmu na adɔyɛ
column6: mma mma ɔfona nyinara a aba hɛn
column12: ofitsi Asiria ahemfo ber do araa dze bodu ndɛ yi nnyɛ w'enyi do adze kakraba."

column2: "Naaso ɔwo etsen wɔ dza aba hɛn do nyinara mu; osiandɛ ɔwo edzi no nokwar mu
column3: na hɛn dze

column2: "nkyii so hɛn ahemfo
column3: hɛn mbapɔmba
column7: eso woenntsie wo mbransɛm na w'adasesɛm a edze dzii dase tsiaa hɔn no."

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔannsom wo wɔ hɔn ahendzi mu
column3: na wo papayɛ kɛse a edze maa hɔn
column4: na asaase tɛtɛr a ɔadɔ seradze a edze mae wɔ hɔn enyim no mu no
column5: nkyii so wɔannsan emmfi hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bɔn no mu."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: yɛyɛ nkowaa ndɛ da yi
column4: na asaase a ɔwo edze maa hɛn egyanom
column5: dɛ wondzi no do aba na no do ndzepa bi no

column2: "Na ɔsow ndɔbaa pii dze ma ahemfo a osian hɛn bɔn ntsi ma edze hɔn esisi hɛn do no: eso wɔwɔ tum wɔ hɛn nyimpadua do
column3: na hɛn mbowa do

column2: "Na iyi nyinara so mpo mu no yeridzi nokwar ahyɛmu
column3: na yɛrekyerɛw; na hɛn mbapɔmba
